Patriotus

While our troops relinquish their positions in Iraq, our politicians work out a new "victorious plan" of Iran's seizure!
 To tell the truth recent desertion of 1,300 soldiers during military operation in Basra shows that our Iraqi military contingent is demoralized and atrophied to the last degree. But we have never heard about it. It looks like our officials are passing over it in silence, because they are fast in preparing military operations in Iran. As I know Pentagon is going to invest over $900 billion for developing new weapons and equipment now! It is whispered that our military plan to spend over $335 billions for Iran campaign. I can't understand it! 
 How long will we be tolerant to such dangerous line of our present leaders' policy when ones line their pockets while the others have to suffer?

post_info.post_title: Our politicians work out a new victorious plan...

Archangel

I suspect that although you might be considered a Patriot somewhere, it isn't in America where your loyalty rests. Do you have any condemnation for Iran's refusal to accept Israel's right to exist? Or their continued threats to wipe Israel off of the face of the Earth? As a Patriot, do you have a problem with the prospects of that reality that Israel must face each and every day of their existence?
electrolyte

I suspect that although you might be considered a Patriot somewhere, it isn't in America where your loyalty rests.

 Typical rightwing idiocy. As soon as someone so much as suggests that things in Iraq aren't going well or questions further offensive movements, accuse him/her of not being a patriot. emoticon_rolleyes
Archangel

How much you want to bet he isn't even American? How many of us do you know who type in broken English? But you do what you do best and attack me for whatever foolish reason you can come up with lyteboy. emoticon_rolleyes How does it feel to always be on the side of the enemy? What is such an existence like I wonder? 
 http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/middle_east/3129138.stm
 
 http://www.jtf.org/america/america.iranian.dictator.vows.to.destroy.america.htm
 
 http://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-3328416,00.html
 Iranian paper: Great war to wipe out Israel coming
 
 Iranian newspapers Kehyan and and Resalat have urged Muslims around the world to prepare for a 'great war' to destroy the State of Israel. 
 
 The newspapers published the editorials, translated from Persian by MEMRI , the Middle East translation service, to mark 'Quds' day on October 20, an Iranian 'holiday' calling for the "liberation" of Jerusalem and war against Israel. 
 
 "Hizbullah destroyed at least half of Israel in the Lebanon war... Now only half the path (to its destruction) remains," an editorial in the conservative Keyhan newspaper declared. 
 
 "It was proven that, by means of an offensive operation that need not be equal to Israel's moves, it is possible to neutralize the Zionist navy," the article said triumphantly. 
 
 'Great war not far off' 
 
 It continued: "Just as in one 33-day war more than 50 percent of Israel was destroyed, and the hope of its supporters for the continued life of this regime was broken, it is likely that in the next battle, the second half will also collapse." 
 
 "On that day... Jordan will not be able to prevent the Jordanian Islamists from operating through the long Jordan-Palestine border, and the millions of Egyptian Islamists... will not let the Sinai-Israel border remain quiet, and the Syrian Golan Heights will not remain as a (mere) observer of the battle. That day is not so far off."
 
 The Resalat newspaper struck a similarly bellicose tone with an editorial entitled "Preparations for the Great War." 
 This is the reality of the threat that Iran poses to Israel and the USA. So tell me, what kind of American Patriot would defend such a Country that would seek to deny Israel their right to exist?
Jo Bennett

Hang on, you're assessing a country's foreign policy based on the editorials of some of its newspapers. Imagine basing your view of the US on the supermarket tabloids, or on the rantings of Ann "we should invade their countries and convert them to Christianity" Coulter. You'll have to do better than that.
Ripskar

How many Yanks use broken English? (Note capitalisation) ;)
 Well, all of 'em old chap, what.

 Plenty. You haven't noticed how many "sentences" you post that aren't sentences?
 
 
But you do what you do best and attack me for whatever foolish reason you can come up with lyteboy.

 Saying that it's questionable at best to attack Iran is the same as "defending" Iran?

Plenty. You haven't noticed how many "sentences" you post that aren't sentences?

 
 Are you actually saying that I speak broken english? Do you see why it's so easy calling you a blatant liar and a dishonest poster who concentrates more on the personal attack, rather than actually debating truthfully?

Are you actually saying that I speak broken english?

 No, I said that there are lots of native speakers who aren't grammarians. Imperfect English -- especially as barely imperfect as the OP's -- isn't an indicator of anything. The fact that you opened yourself up to criticism was bonus.
 
 
Do you see why it's so easy calling you a blatant liar and a dishonest poster who concentrates more on the personal attack, rather than actually debating truthfully?

 I know why you find it so easy: you should change your name to The Projectionist to reflect that reason.

 You said nothing of the sort. Only in hindsight are you backpedaling and clarifying what you want us to believe you meant.

 I didn't at all. You don't need an opening in order to attack me.
